title: Days of the Week and Banking Hours

sections.title: Days and Time
sections.content:
When is the bank open? Let's learn the days of the week.

- **Monday**: Lunes
- **Tuesday**: Martes
- **Wednesday**: Miércoles
- **Thursday**: Jueves
- **Friday**: Viernes
- **Saturday**: Sábado
- **Sunday**: Domingo
- **Opening hours**: Horario de apertura
- **Weekend**: Fin de semana

sections.title: Modern Banking: 24/7 Support
sections.content:
A physical bank branch closes, but a Neobank is always open.

- **24/7**: 24 horas, 7 días a la semana
- **Always open**: Siempre abierto
- **Chatbot**: Chat de ayuda (IA)
- **Support**: Soporte / Ayuda

### Comparison
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Traditional Branch] --> B[9:00 AM - 2:00 PM]
    C[Digital App] --> D[Always Open 24/7]
```

sections.title: Present Simple for Schedules
sections.content:
We use the Present Simple for things that are always true, like bank hours.

- The bank **opens** at 9:00 AM.
- We **close** on Sundays.
- The app **works** 24/7.

**Structure (He/She/It + verb-s):**
- The ATM **works** (It works).
- The chatbot **helps** (It helps).
